## Filterable table

```{r, echo=FALSE}
soil_samples_df <- read.delim(file = "Samples/Sample_metadata.txt")

```

## Plotly chart
```{r, echo=FALSE}
fig <- plotly::plot_ly(
  x = c("giraffes", "orangutans", "monkeys"),
  y = c(20, 14, 23),

  type = "bar"
)

fig
```

## Interactive plots
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
soil_samples_df <- read.delim(file = "Samples/Sample_metadata.txt")

# feed shared object
data_ct <- crosstalk::SharedData$new(soil_samples_df[,c(1,2,3,5,6,7,11,12,13)])

crosstalk::bscols(
  leaflet(data_ct, width = "100%", height = 300) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(),
  
  d3scatter::d3scatter(data = data_ct, ~Org.Matter, ~Alpha_div, ~Biome, width = "100%", height = 300),
  
  DT::datatable(data_ct,rownames = FALSE),
  widths = c(5,5,8)
)
```
